description: Overrides the sun color for a level. Use "resetSunLight" to revert to the map's values.

params.name: red
description: The red component of sunlight color. 0 is black, 1 is fullbright, more than 1 is overbright.

params.name: green
description: The green component of sunlight color. 0 is black, 1 is fullbright, more than 1 is overbright.

params.name: blue
description: The blue component of sunlight color. 0 is black, 1 is fullbright, more than 1 is overbright.
